ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and amassed wealth and covetously hoarded it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and who accumulated wealth without spending it for a good purpose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And accumulated wealth and hoarded it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And collect (wealth) and hide it (from spending it in the cause of Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And amasses (wealth) then shuts it up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and amassed wealth and hoarded it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And collect (wealth) and hide it (from use)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And collect (wealth) and hide it (from spending it in the Cause of Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:18] and amassed, wealth, then hoarded, keeping it in containers and refraining from paying from it what is God’s due.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And hoarded (wealth)) in the life of the world (and withheld it) he put it in a container and refused to give the right of Allah which is due from it.
